data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn, adɛn enti na woapo yɛn koraa yi?
Kae nkurɔfoɔ a wotɔɔ wɔn teteete no,
Dane wo ho kyerɛ mmubuiɛ a ɛda so wɔ hɔ yi so,
Wʼatamfoɔ bobɔɔ mu wɔ baabi a wohyiaa yɛn no;
Wɔyɛɛ wɔn sɛ nnipa a wɔrehwim mmonnua
Wɔde wɔn mmonnua ne nname
Wɔhyee wo kronkronbea no dwerɛbee;
Wɔkaa wɔ wɔn akoma mu sɛ, “Yɛbɛtiatia wɔn so ayɛ wɔn pasaa!”
Yɛnhunu wo nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a ɛyɛ nwanwa biara bio;
Ao Onyankopɔn, wʼatamfoɔ bɛsere wo akɔsi da bɛn?
Adɛn enti na woatwe wo nsa, wo nsa nifa no?
Nanso, Ao Onyankopɔn, woyɛ me ɔhene firi tete;
Ɛyɛ wo na wode wo tumi paee ɛpo mu no;
Wopɛkyɛɛ Lewiatan no ti
Wo na womaa nsuwa ne nsutire tueeɛ;
Adekyeeɛ wɔ wo na adesaeɛ nso yɛ wo dea;
Ɛyɛ wo na wototoo asase so ahyeɛ nyinaa;
Ao Awurade, kae sɛdeɛ ɔtamfoɔ no sere woɔ,
Mfa wʼaborɔnoma nkwa mma nkekaboa;
Ma wʼapam no ho nhia wo,
Mma wɔn a wɔahyɛ wɔn soɔ no anim nngu ase;
Ao Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so na ka wo ara wʼasɛm;
Mmu wʼani ngu wɔn a wɔsɔre tia wo no nteateam so,
